bibl.title: Letter from Cesar Rodriguez Exposito to Philip Showalter Hench, November 10, 1952

div1.p: Exposito invites Hench to attend and speak at the dedication ceremony for Camp Lazear.

div1.head: Letter from Cesar Rodriguez Exposito to Philip Showalter Hench, November 10, 1952
div1.opener:
Patronato Pro-Conservación de la Caseta
de los Trabajos Comprobatorios del
Descubrimiento de Finlay
----------
Marianao November 10 of 1952
Dr Philip Hench
Mayo Clinic
Rochester, Minnessota
U.S.A.
Dear Dr Hench:
div1.p:
In the name of Dr Alberto Recio, Pro-Conservation Patronate
President, Building Number 1 Lazear Camp; where the work of the American
Commision proving the discovery of Dr Carlos, J. Finlay, I have the honor
to invite you on the act on unveiling the bust; Drs Walter Reed, James Ca-
rroll, Jesse Lazear, Aristides Agramonte, Leonard Wood, Carlos Finlay and
Claudio Delgado, as well as, the plates with the names of the volunteers,
such experiments and the persons who took parts on the same.

Said act will take place 3rd December at 10.00 A.M. on the spot La-
zear Camp, “San José” farm, Pogolotti, District Marianao, Havana, Cuba.-
We hope to have the honor you accompany us, on said ceremony and speak
in relation with that episode in the name of the American's Doctors. You
will spend 8 or 10 minutes on your speech.
div1.closer:
Very sincerely Cesar Rodriguez Exposite
Secretary Cesar Rodriguez Exposite
Marti 219-Marianao
Habana.- CUBA.
P.S. - Next week Dr Nogueira will send the
complete program and some invitation
for the affair.
